Malden.Boston Open Source Science Laboratory:
Boston Open Source Science Laboratory or BosLab is a labspace in Somerville, MA, which is part of the DIYbio and biohacking movement.


== Major projects ==
Lightbulb PCR, which aims to build a cheap but functional PCR thermal cycler using PVC tubing, a incandescent light bulb and a computer fan run with an open source microcontroller.
BlueGene- Indigo Biosynthesis In E. Coli


== Ethical concerns ==
The institute of Ethics and Emerging Technologies covered the ethics of BosLab and other DIYbio groups.
